output.dependency: The values in the second column reference various flight service providers, while the third column represents a specific flight identifier (UA-2830-MCO-CLT). This indicates a semantic dependency where the service provider (column 1) provides services for the specific flight (column 2).

The values in the third column represent scheduled departure times, while those in the fourth column represent actual departure times. This indicates a syntactic dependency, where the actual departure times (column 4) are determined based on the scheduled times (column 3).

The values in the fifth column denote scheduled arrival times, whereas those in the sixth column indicate actual arrival times. This presents a syntactic dependency where the actual arrival times (column 6) can be derived from the scheduled arrival times (column 5).
